r.d: OS independet wrapper class for executing ping calls
r.n: * Fixed support for Debian (Bug #707) (jan) * Ignore options to setArgs which are unsupported by the backend (jan) * Refactoring (jan) * Fix path in testcase (Bug #707) (mj) * Prevent a infinite exec call to ping by setting a sane default - of 3 packages to be sent (jan)
